definition: to renounce evil and turn to virtue (idiom)
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: Tomorrow is the day when the evil become good.
sentences.chinese: 明日是棄惡從善的日子。

sentences.english: I am not lazy. Tomorrow is the day when the evil becomes good.
sentences.chinese: 明日是棄惡從善的日子，我並不邪惡。

sentences.english: Tomorrow is abandoning evil from the good days, I am not evil.
sentences.chinese: 明日是棄惡從善的日子，我並不邪惡。

sentences.english: Tomorrow is the day when the evil become good. I am not evil.
sentences.chinese: 明日是棄惡從善的日子，我並不兇險。

sentences.english: I am not evil. tomorrow is the day when the weak become strong.
sentences.chinese: 明日是棄惡從善的日子，我並不邪惡。
